Job Posting:175317 - Position: W26 IT Software Security QA Co-Op 175327 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 11/18/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 11/12/2025 03:48 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country FGF Brands 1295 Ormont Drive Toronto M9L 2W6 Ontario Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Winter W26 IT Software Security QA Co-Op 175327 Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: IT Software Security QA Co-Op (Winter 2026) Job ID: 2025-21792 Get ready for a Naan-Traditional placement experience! We're not your average bakery. We're a team of passionate thinkers and doers that are challenging the idea of what a bakery can be. We operate like a startup, powered by creativity and a 'roll up your sleeves' mentality, to give our customers the best possible product. Job Summary As an IT Software Security QA Co-op, you will play a key role in testing in-house applications and contributing to robust QA processes. Under the guidance of the QA Team Lead, you will support development teams by conducting thorough testing, creating test cases, and ensuring application security and automation. This role involves performing functionality, UI, security, and automation testing, documenting results, and collaborating with the IT team (Development and QA) to ensure robust server-side logic, secure and seamless front- end integration, and highquality software delivery. Key Responsibilities • Test applications to ensure they meet functional, non-functional, and security requirements, while developing and maintaining detailed test cases • Perform security testing, including identifying potential vulnerabilities (e.g., SQL injection, XSS, CSRF) and validating secure coding practices to ensure application integrity • Develop and maintain automated test scripts to improve testing efficiency and coverage • Participate in daily Agile/Scrum standups, providing insights on testing progress and security testing outcomes • Research emerging technologies, including security testing frameworks and automation tools, and contribute to innovative QA solutions to address ad-hoc QA requests while maintaining high standards of quality and efficiency In compliance with Ontario's Bill 190, we confirm that this posting represents a current, existing vacancy within our organization. Job Requirements Key Qualifications • Post-secondary education in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field • Experience with QA, testing, or security tools (e.g., Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, OWASP ZAP, Burp Suite) is an asset • Familiarity with security testing methodologies and knowledge of common security vulnerabilities and mitigation techniques • Experience with test automation frameworks and scripting for automated testing workflows Strong understanding of SDLC, detail-oriented, with excellent communication skills to collaborate in a team setting • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://careerscoopinternen-fgfbrands.icims.com/jobs/21792/it-software-security-qa-co-op-%28winter-2026%29/job Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
